mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(ourr.id) FROM org_user_rules_ref ourr, org_usecarrules oucr WHERE 1=1 AND ourr.`status` = 1 AND oucr.`status` = 1 AND ourr.userulesid = oucr.id AND ourr.userid = ou.id ) >0 hasrule, ( SELECT COUNT(oo.orderno) FROM org_order oo WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.userid = ou.id AND oo.orderstatus = #{orderstatus} AND ( oo.paymentstatus = #{paymentstatus} OR ISNULL(oo.paymentstatus) ) ) > 0 notpay, ( SELECT COUNT(oo.orderno) FROM org_order oo WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.userid = ou.id AND oo.orderstatus IN (#{orderstatuslist}) ) notdone, ou.* FROM org_user ou WHERE 1=1 AND ou.`status` = 1 AND ou.id = #{userid}
SELECT oo.* FROM org_order oo WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.orderno = #{orderno}
SELECT llc.* FROM le_leasescompany llc WHERE 1 = 1 AND llc.`Status` = 1 ORDER BY llc.CreateTime LIMIT 1

SELECT oocr.* FROM org_organ_company_ref oocr, org_user ou WHERE 1=1 AND ou.`Status` = 1 AND oocr.`Status` = 1 AND oocr.bindstate = 1 AND oocr.organid IN ( SELECT org.id FROM org_organ org WHERE org.creditcode = ( SELECT org2.creditcode FROM org_organ org2 WHERE org2. STATUS = 1 AND org2.id = ou.organid ) and org.customertype!=1 ) AND oocr.companyid = #{companyid} AND ou.id = #{userid}

SELECT la.startprice, la.rangeprice, la.timeprice, lv.* FROM le_vehiclemodels lv, le_accountrules la, le_company_rules_ref lcrr WHERE 1=1 AND lcrr.`Status` = 1 AND lv.`Status` = 1 and lv.modelstatus = "0" AND la.`Status` = 1 AND lcrr.rulestate = 1 AND la.type = 1 AND la.rulesstate = 0 AND la.cartype = lv.Id AND la.rulesrefid = lcrr.id AND lcrr.organid IN ( SELECT org.id FROM org_organ org, org_user ou WHERE org.creditcode = ( SELECT org2.creditcode FROM org_organ org2 WHERE org2. STATUS = 1 AND org2.id = ou.organid AND ou.id = #{userid} ) and org.customertype!=1 ) AND lcrr.leasescompanyid = #{companyid} AND la.city = #{city} AND la.rulestype = #{ordertype} AND lv.Id IN ( SELECT oucr.vehiclemodels FROM org_user ou, org_usecarrules oucr, org_user_rules_ref ourr WHERE 1=1 AND ou.`Status` = 1 AND oucr.`status` = 1 AND ourr.`status` = 1 AND ourr.userid = ou.id AND ourr.userulesid = oucr.id AND oucr.usetype = #{ordertype} AND ou.id = #{userid} ) ORDER BY lv.`level`

SELECT fav.*,CONCAT(fav.name,fav.phone) namephone FROM ( ( SELECT NULL id, ou.id userid, ou.nickname `name`, ou.account phone, ou.createtime, ou.updatetime, ou.id creater, ou.id updater, ou.`Status` FROM org_user ou WHERE ou.`status` = 1 AND ou.account = (select account from org_user where id = #{userid}) ) UNION ( SELECT om.* FROM pub_mostcontact om, org_user ou WHERE om.`status` = 1 AND ou.`status` = 1 AND om.userphone = ou.account AND ou.account = (select account from org_user where id = #{userid}) ) ) fav
WHERE (fav.phone LIKE '%${sSearch}%' OR fav.name LIKE '%${sSearch}%') group by CONCAT(fav.name,fav.phone) LIMIT ${iDisplayStart},${iDisplayLength}

SELECT om.*,pca.city citycaption FROM pub_mostaddress om, pub_cityaddr pca WHERE 1=1 AND pca.`status` = 1 AND om.`status` = 1 AND pca.id = om.city AND om.userphone = (select account from org_user where id = #{userid}) AND ( pca.city LIKE '%${sSearch}%' OR om.address LIKE '%${sSearch}%' ) LIMIT ${iDisplayStart},${iDisplayLength}
